684140.name: Fantasy Grounds - Disposable Heroes: Fantasy 4E (Token Pack)
684140.description:
Disposable Heroes Fantasy 4E

Fantasy Token Pack
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Grounds II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear
in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre
and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your
game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures:
32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality
that best meets your needs.
This set contains full-color token representations of Fantasy 4E core races and
classes, beautifully illustrated and colored by Joshua Cayne. Two formats are included:
full-body figures and top-cropped figures for a larger image.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • Dragonbrood Fighter
  • Dragonbrood Paladin
  • Dragonbrood Warlord
  • Dwarf Cleric
  • Dwarf Fighter
  • Dwarf Paladin
  • Dwarf Ranger
  • Sidhe Rogue
  • Sidhe Warlord
  • Sidhe Wizard
  • Elf Cleric
  • Elf Ranger
  • Elf Rogue
  • Half-Elf Paladin
  • Half-Elf Warlock
  • Half-Elf Warlord
  • Halfling Ranger
  • Halfling Rogue
  • Halfling Warlock
  • Human Cleric
  • Human Fighter
  • Human Paladin
  • Human Ranger
  • Human Rogue
  • Human Warlock
  • Human Warlord
  • Human Wizard
  • Darkling Rogue
  • Darkling Warlock
  • Darkling Warlord
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Brett M. Bernstein
Other downloadable and printed Disposable Heroes paper miniatures and counters,
as well as other quality products, can be found at .
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
